metadata.Title: CVE-2020-2804 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Vulnerability in the MySQL Server product of Oracle MySQL (component:Server: Memcached). Supported versions that are affected are 5.6.47 andprior, 5.7.29 and prior and 8.0.19 and prior. Difficult to exploitvulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access viamultiple protocols to compromise MySQL Server. Successful attacks of thisvulnerability can result in unauthorized ability to cause a hang orfrequently repeatable crash (complete DOS) of MySQL Server. CVSS 3.0 BaseScore 5.9 (Availability impacts). CVSS Vector:(CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H).

criterions.comment: mysql-5.5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mysql-5.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
mariadb-5.5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
percona-xtradb-cluster-5.5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
